#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Know the Odds in Life
#Text=Life is not easy .
#Text=Life does not convey the same meaning to all ...
#Text=To one it may be a book to explore gradually , reading page by page .
#Text=To one life may seem as a beautiful gift of God for which one is thankful .
#Text=To one life may seem as a boxing champ catching one in the corner of the ring throwing punch after punch till seeing him/her fall down .
#Text=To one life may look life a burden , carrying it on one 's back ...
#Text=Each and everyone of us , has seen or will see these phases of life but more importantly , its necessary to know the odds in life and to deal with them in an efficient way .
#Text=Below , i would like to share a few tips to make you take life as a precious gift of life and to be thankful for it .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Never Ever say Never .
#Text=Everyone is unique in some way or the other .
#Text=What 's is important for us is to never give up and never give in .
#Text=Life is as simple as we take it .
#Text=The more we make it complicated , the more it gets .
#Text=Fight for your right .
#Text=Its is mandatory for us to know that we have to fight for our rights simply because its our right .
#Text=No one has the right to take what is meant to be for us .
#Text=Its is worth it to fight for your happiness , to fight for your job , to fight for your married life and to fight for everything which you think is somehow connected to you .
#Text=Remember , I do not mean to throw punches onto someone .
#Text=Fighting spirit is what is of my concern , the confidence that you can handle relations , communicate effectively and prosper with confidence and stability .
#Text=Never compromise .
#Text=As long as you know your capacity to deliver your best , never ever give your second best .
#Text=Do not procrastinate .
#Text=The evil of procrastination , makes you lose everything you have and meanwhile take the future opportunities waiting for you .
#Text=When you have decided to take a bath , just do it .
#Text=Have faith in God .
#Text=A religious bonding
#Text=no matter whatever religion you follow , always helps you keep your spirits and morality into a higher level .
#Text=Always have faith in God and know that God is watching you and will always be there for you no matter what .
#Text=Love yourself .
#Text=You need to love yourself if you are to spread love to others .
#Text=Always think of best things for yourself , best clothing , best shape , best activities and best food .
#Text=But make sure , in the course of achieving your goals , do not take away the best of others .
#Text=Always strike for a fair deal .
#Text=Get rid of your bad habits .
#Text=It s not easy , but it is not impossible .
#Text=Bad habits are like mountains , they are pretty huge in built but they are climbable .
#Text=If you think you have 3 bad habits , neglect the two till you get rid of the first one .
#Text=and gradually , replace the 1st bad habit with a good one and same goes for the others two .
#Text=Its your life .
#Text=Know that its your life .
#Text=Nobody has the right to control your life , to take away your life and to interfere into your life .
#Text=As long as you know that you are YOURSELF , you are successful .
#Text=Do not hesitate to say a FIRM NO or an ENCOURAGING YES to yourself and to others .
#Text=Do regular Exercise .
#Text=No matter whatever exercise or whatever sports you are in .
#Text=Make sure you do something in this regard .
#Text=Badminton , Basketball , Football or Gym , anything will seal the deal .
#Text=Its really helps to esteem your self-image , and good physique .
#Text=Do not Concentrate on what i have written .
#Text=My writing is not standard , my suggestions are not the best .
#Text=Its just some tips , take it or leave but make sure you decide what is best for you .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Following it will help you tackle the odds .
#Text=Not following them will not make your life miserable either .
